entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
